external_games.name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong 2: March of the Minis - Cannon Kaos

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong 2: March of the Minis - Cannon Kaos
summary: Mario vs. DK 2: Cannon Kaos was an online Flash advergame published by Nintendo to promote Mario vs. Donkey Kong 2: March of the Minis, first released in 2006 for the Nintendo DS. It was playable on the game's official website and on the Nintendo Arcade section of nintendo.com.
